name: Ghost of a Chance
description:
Ghost of a Chance

Try to complete the level as alive, or drag your body to the end as a ghost - either way works!

This was a short experimental project for the GameDevTV 2022 Game Jam for the theme - Death is only the beginning. Got to play around more with menu's and more tile based stuff with this!

If I work on this more in the future, I would like to add/improve on the Menus, Add more levels, Player Mechanics, add sounds and state transitions.
